Package gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment

Class AbstractStructureParser

java.lang.Object
gov.cdc.izgw.v2tofhir.segment.AbstractStructureParser
All Implemented Interfaces:
StructureParser
Direct Known Subclasses:
AbstractSegmentParser
public abstract class AbstractStructureParser extends Object implements StructureParser
This is an abstract implementation for StructureParser instances used by the MessageParser.
Author:
Audacious Inquiry

    • getFirstResource

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> R getFirstResource(Class<R> clazz)
      Get the first resource of the specified class that was created during the parsing of a message. This method is typically used to get resources that only appear once in a message, such as the MessageHeader, or Patient resource.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The resource type.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class for the specified resource.
      Returns:
      The first resource of the specified type, or null if not found.

    • getLastResource

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> R getLastResource(Class<R> clazz)
      Get the most recently created resource of the specified type. This method is typically uses by a structure parser to get the most recently created resource in a group, such as the Immunization or ImmunizationRecommendation in an ORDER group in an RSP_K11 message.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of resource to get.
      Parameters:
      clazz - The class for the specified resource.
      Returns:
      The last resource created of the specified type, or null if not found.

    • getResource

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> R getResource(Class<R> clazz, String id)
      Get a resource of the specified type with the specified identifier.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of resource
      Parameters:
      clazz - The specified type of the resource
      id - The identifier (just the id part, no resource type or url
      Returns:
      The requested resource, or null if not found.

    • getResources

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> List<R> getResources(Class<R> clazz)
      Get all resources of the specified type that have been created during this parsing session.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of resource
      Parameters:
      clazz - The specified type of resource to retrieve
      Returns:
      A list of the requested resources, or an empty list of none were found.

    • createResource

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> R createResource(Class<R> clazz)
      Create a resource of the specified type for this parsing session. This method is typically called by the first segment of a group that is associated with a given resource.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of resource
      Parameters:
      clazz - The sepecified type for the resource to create
      Returns:
      A new resource of the specified type. The id will already be populated.

    • findResource

      public <R extends org.hl7.fhir.r4.model.Resource> R findResource(Class<R> clazz, String id)
      Find a resource of the specified type for this parsing session, or create one if none can be found or id is null or empty. This method is typically called by the first segment of a group that is associated with a given resource. It can be used to create a resource with a given id value if control is needed over the id value.
      Type Parameters:
      R - The type of resource
      Parameters:
      clazz - The sepecified type for the resource to create
      id - The identifier to assign.
      Returns:
      A new resource of the specified type. The id will already be populated.

    • getField

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type getField(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Get the first occurrence of the specified field from an HL7 V2 segment.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field for. This is a convenience method to get a field that does not throw exceptions the way that segment.getField() does.
      field - The field number
      Returns:
      The specified field, or null of the field does not exist or is empty.

    • getFields

      public static ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Type[] getFields(ca.uhn.hl7v2.model.Segment segment, int field)
      Get all occurrences of the specified field from an HL7 V2 segment.
      Parameters:
      segment - The segment to get the field for. This is a convenience method to get a field that does not throw exceptions the way that segment.getField() does.
      field - The field number
      Returns:
      An array containing all occurrences of the specified field.

    • getProperty

      public <T> T getProperty(Class<T> t)
      Get a property value from the context. This is simply a convenience method for calling getContext().getProperty(t).
      Type Parameters:
      T - The type of property to retrieve.
      Parameters:
      t - The class type of the property
      Returns:
      The requested property, or null if not present
